tasks.lidar: deno task lidar:cleanup && deno task lidar:pipeline && deno task lidar:contours && deno task lidar:slopes && deno task lidar:png
tasks.lidar:contours: gdal_contour -a elev out/dem.tif out/contours.shp -i 2.5 && gdaldem slope out/dem.tif out/slopes.tif
tasks.lidar:png: gdal_translate -of PNG -scale -ot byte out/dem.tif out/dem.png && gdal_translate -of PNG -scale -ot byte out/low-vegetation.tif out/low-vegetation.png && gdal_translate -of PNG -scale -ot byte out/middle-vegetation.tif out/middle-vegetation.png && gdal_translate -of PNG -scale -ot byte out/high-vegetation.tif out/high-vegetation.png
